messages.title: Kamran Hussain is fighting to STOP BREXIT
messages.content: This election is about Brexit and Kamran Hussain is leading the charge to Stop Brexit in our area. Kamran said: 'A vote for the Lib Dems is a vote for no more Brexit. It means we can get on with building a fairer, greener, more caring Britain, forced to rely on foodbanks. It means taking the billion-pound trade auction on the NHS off the table. It means keeping the benefits of EU membership and having a strong influence on international issues. That is why I am fighting to Stop Brexit.' Kamran said: 'Boris Johnson's Brexit deal is bankrolled by those who want to make billions from the destruction of our country.' The Lib Dems do not want to see our public services turned to profit. We want to build a brighter future where people are prioritised over profits whilst wrangling about leaving the EU. This is why I am fighting to STOP BREXIT.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Kamran was chair of the Yorkshire and Humber Lib Dems Remain campaign at the referendum. He has been campaigning ever since to Stop Brexit.
The Lib Dems are the only major party committed to stopping Brexit in all circumstances. They are the largest Remain party.
Kamran is a successful, award winning Headingley-based solicitor. He has a track record of getting things done and will stand up for local people.

19 Labour MPs voted for Boris's deal.
They want to negotiate a 'Labour Brexit'
Jeremy Corbyn isn't up to the job. Jeremy Corbyn has failed to deal with anti-Semitism rising inside his party. If he can't deal with that, how can he expect to deal with the issues facing Britain?
